entry.title: St. Mary's Hospital/title> One of the staff physicians talks some sense into you. You are disabused of certain crazy but accurate notions. Lose 1 Clue token.
Woods
entry.value:
You trip over an object which turns out to be a rusty lockbox. If you open it, make a Luck (+0) check and consult the following chart:
Successes:
0) A rotted human foot. Lose 1 Sanity.
1) Draw 1 Common Item
2) Draw 1 Unique Item
3+) $10 in jewelry

entry.title: Ye Olde Magick Shoppe
entry.value: Looking closely at a mummified head in the shop, you are horrified to find it looking back at you! Lose 1 Sanity.

entry.title: St. Mary's Hospital/title> The corpse you are examining isn't quite dead yet. It reaches out and grabs you by the throat. Lose 1 Sanity. Then, you must fight the corpse. If you pass a Combat (-1) check, you defeat it and gain 1 Clue token. Otherwise, move to the street.
Woods
entry.value: You have stumbled onto a still owned by the Sheldon Gang. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you pass, skulk away without being seen. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina as the Sheldon Gang works you over while escorting you from the woods. In either case, move to the street.

entry.title: Ye Olde Magick Shoppe
entry.value: Looking into a glass ball, you receive a vision of things to come. Turn the top card of one location deck of your choice face up. The next investigator to have an enounter at that location draws that encounter card.

entry.title: St. Mary's Hospital/title> You agree to undergo an experminetal treatment. Roll a die. On a 1-3, gain that many Stamina. On a 4-6, nothing happens.
Ye Olde Magick Shoppe
entry.value: You find a sleeping Sheldon Gang member near the still. Make a Sneak (-2) check to try to swipe the shotgun he has dropped on the ground. If you pass, take a Shotgun from the Common Item deck if there is one. If you fail, the guard awakens. You are caught and beaten losing 2 Stamina, but escape with your life. Move to the street.
